Question:
Why is the RL78/G24 ideal for DALI-2 communication?
Answer:
The RL78/G24 is equipped with DALI-2 communication peripheral functions, enabling high-speed processing compared to conventional software decoding/encoding, which is CPU-intensive. In addition, the basic communication code can be omitted, thus reducing development costs and evaluation time.
Suitable Products
RL78/G24
